name: HEAVEN ATTACK!
description:
A turn-based command battle RPG created with "RPG Maker vx Ace".
Up to episode 1 is currently available.

Story

Gabriel comes to wake up Michael sleeping in his room in heaven.
It's my turn to look around today. Let's start before Metatron gets angry.

Features

The main story takes about 2 hours to play.
The sub-event has over 10 hours of play time.
angel in action.
Loose conversation drama.
random encounters.
Digging for rare items.
Customize and grow freely.

Note
It does not support STEAM overlays, cloud saves, achievements, etc.
Controller operation does not support operation using the cross key.
